author: Pon Vasanth Arunachalam
text:
Four booked under SC/ST Act

The Madurai district police on Friday booked four people from Meenakshipuram near Melur under the SC and ST (Prevention of Atrocities Act) for allegedly hurling casteist abuses against a Dalit person and attacking him with a knife.

The issue allegedly broke out over the playing of controversial ‘beep’’ song sung by actor Simbu on Friday afternoon during the ongoing Margazhi month festival in the village.

When the choice of the song was questioned by M. Kavi, a Dalit person, four youths belonging to caste Hindu community allegedly abused him.

Late on Friday night, the same group of men allegedly attacked the Dalit person with a knife. A case has been filed in the Melur police station.
title: Four booked under SC/ST act
